text: viśvāsaya tæbū piriminda, viśvāsaya tæbū gæhænunda (taman tuḷa) kenekuṭa keneku samīpa sahāyayan vaśayen siṭinnāha. ovun (keneku anit kenāva) hon̆dak karana men poḷam̆bavāda, pāpayan nokarana men vaḷakvāda, salātaya nokaḍavā iṭu karada, sakāt gevaminda siṭinnāha. allāhṭada, ohugē dūtayāṭada avanata vī kaṭayutu karannāha. mevænnanṭa itāmat ikmanin allāh dayāva pahaḷa karannēya. niyata vaśayenma allāh balasampannayeku hā gnānavantayekuda vaśayen siṭinnēya
